Name: Mistwood Heroes
About the game: Mistwood is a huge forest-state populated by a variety of inhabitants. You will play as 4 different accidentally combined mercenaries who will save Mistwood from all adversity and even more.. With you will happen the most incredible events.. You will visit places such as the lair of the bandits, the royal castle, creepy cave, the Flamelands and even more of dangerous locations! On your way will be enormous amount of bosses that will be a real hard challenge for you! KEY FEATURES: ● Extraordinary Bosses. ● Side Quests. ● Beautiful Music.
